src:
Solskjaer Optimistis Marcus Rashford Bakal Semakin Menggila
01 Nov 2019, 20:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah keyakinan diungkapkan oleh Ole Gunnar Solskjaer terhadap Marcus Rashford. Ia menilai penyerang Manchester United itu bakal semakin menggila setelah ini.
Satu bulan yang lalu, Rashford mendapatkan banyak kritikan. Ini dikarenakan performanya yang kurang baik setelah diplot menjadi penyerang tunggal saat Anthony Martial cedera.
Namun satu minggu terakhir, Rashford mendapatkan banyak sekali pujian. Hal ini dikarenakan ia mengemas empat gol dari empat pertandingan terakhir Manchester United.
Solskjaer mengakui salah satu penyebab Rashford performanya melejit karena kembalinya Anthony Martial. "Saya rasa setelah Anthony kembali, Marcus mulai tampil luar biasa," beber Solskjaer yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Solskjaer Optimistic Marcus Rashford Will Be Even More Crazy
Nov 1 2019, 20:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A belief expressed by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer against Marcus Rashford. He considered the Manchester United striker would be even more crazy after this.
One month ago, Rashford received a lot of criticism. This is due to poor performance after being plotted to be the lone striker when Anthony Martial was injured.
But in the past week, Rashford received a lot of praise. This is because he has scored four goals in Manchester United's last four matches.
Solskjaer acknowledged that one of the causes of Rashford's performance skyrocketed due to the return of Anthony Martial. "I think after Anthony returned, Marcus began to appear extraordinary," Solskjaer said, quoted by the Manchester Evening News.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
